# Pop method for removing; pop() takes index as the argument
a=[1,2,3,4,5,2,6,7,2,8]
a.pop(3)
source.ae997d98:
# Remove takes the element as argument.
a=[1,2,3,4,5,2,6,7,2,8]
a.remove(2)
a

# Insert method with syntax index number and the value for replacement on that index no
a=[1,2,3,4,5,2,6,7,2,8]
a.insert(2,323)
a
